name: The Oberoi Udaivilas
metaTitle: The Oberoi Udaivilas Wedding | Best Palace Wedding Venue Udaipur
metaDescription: Plan your dream wedding at The Oberoi Udaivilas, Udaipur's most luxurious lakeside palace resort. Stunning Lake Pichola views, royal venues, and world-class hospitality for 50-1000 guests.
tagline: Where Every Wedding Becomes a Royal Celebration
shortDescription: Set on the banks of Lake Pichola with stunning views of the City Palace and Aravalli Hills, The Oberoi Udaivilas is India's most celebrated luxury wedding destination.
fullDescription: The Oberoi Udaivilas stands as India's most iconic wedding venue, where Mughal grandeur meets contemporary luxury. Spread across 50 acres of prime lakefront land, this architectural masterpiece features interconnected domes, courtyards, and reflecting pools that create an ethereal setting for celebrations. The resort's design pays homage to the royal heritage of Mewar, with intricate hand-carved reliefs, gold leaf frescoes, and traditional Rajasthani craftsmanship. Couples exchange vows with the shimmering Lake Pichola as their backdrop, while guests experience hospitality that has welcomed royalty and celebrities from around the world. Every wedding here is a bespoke production, managed by a dedicated team that transforms visions into reality with impeccable attention to detail.
uniqueSellingPoints: Uninterrupted panoramic views of Lake Pichola and City Palace
Private lakeside ghats for boat arrivals and ceremonial rituals
87 luxury rooms ensuring exclusive buyout options for privacy
Award-winning Oberoi culinary team with customizable royal menus
Dedicated wedding pavilions with indoor and outdoor options
Legacy of hosting some of India's most celebrated weddings
awardsRecognitions: Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards - Top 10 Hotels Globally
TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice - Best of the Best
World's Leading Luxury Resort - World Travel Awards

totalWeddingBudget.note: Includes 3-night buyout, all F&B, basic décor, and coordination. Décor, entertainment, and photography additional.

address: Haridasji Ki Magri, Mulla Talai, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Exit airport, take NH48 towards Udaipur city. Continue for 20 km, take Fateh Sagar Lake Road exit. Follow signs to Haridasji Ki Magri. The resort entrance is on the right after passing the Monsoon Palace viewpoint.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: From City Palace, head south along Lake Pichola. Take the lakeside road past Jag Mandir viewpoint. Continue 3 km to Haridasji Ki Magri. Resort is on the left overlooking the lake.

weddingSeasons.weather: Peak season: 15-28°C, clear skies, perfect for outdoor celebrations

alcoholPolicy: Full bar service available. Premium international brands stocked. Outside alcohol permitted with corkage.
decorRestrictions: No permanent fixtures on heritage structures
Noise restrictions after 10 PM near wildlife sanctuary
noiseRestrictions: Music until 10 PM in outdoor areas, indoor venues until midnight with sound insulation
cancellationPolicy: Full refund 180+ days before. 50% refund 90-179 days. No refund within 90 days. Force majeure provisions apply.
paymentTerms: 30% booking deposit. 40% due 90 days before. Final 30% due 30 days before event.

faqs.question: What is the minimum booking duration for weddings?
faqs.answer: We require a minimum 3-night stay for wedding celebrations. This allows adequate time for setup, multiple events, and a relaxed guest experience. For buyouts during peak season, 4-5 nights is recommended.

faqs.question: Can we have a baraat procession with horse or elephant?
faqs.answer: Yes! We coordinate traditional baraat processions with decorated horses, camels, or elephants. The resort's grand entrance is designed for such arrivals, with our team managing all logistics and permits required.

faqs.question: Is the venue available during monsoon season?
faqs.answer: July-September experiences moderate rainfall, but the resort has stunning indoor venues as backup. Many couples choose this period for smaller, intimate celebrations at significantly reduced rates. The landscape is lush green and incredibly photogenic.

faqs.question: How far in advance should we book?
faqs.answer: For peak season dates (November-February), we recommend booking 18-24 months in advance. Popular dates like Diwali week and year-end holidays book 2+ years ahead. Off-season dates may be available with 6-9 months notice.

faqs.question: What happens if it rains during our outdoor event?
faqs.answer: We have a comprehensive weather contingency plan. Mewar Mahal serves as a stunning indoor backup with full lake views. Our team monitors weather closely and can transition setups within 2 hours. Décor is designed for quick relocation when needed.

faqs.question: Can we arrange boat arrivals for the bride?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Boat arrivals are one of our signature experiences. Decorated traditional boats can transport the bridal party from City Palace to our private ghat. We also arrange boat pickups for guests from Jag Mandir or other lake points.

faqs.question: Are fireworks and fire performances allowed?
faqs.answer: Yes, with proper permits. We coordinate with local authorities for firework displays over the lake. Fire dancers and pyrotechnic shows are popular and can be arranged through our preferred vendor network.

faqs.question: What dietary requirements can you accommodate?
faqs.answer: Our culinary team handles all dietary needs including vegetarian, vegan, Jain (no onion/garlic/root vegetables), gluten-free, halal, and allergies. We conduct detailed menu planning sessions and offer tastings before the event.

faqs.question: Is there parking for guest vehicles?
faqs.answer: We have parking for 150+ vehicles with complimentary valet service. For larger weddings, we arrange additional off-site parking with shuttle service to the venue.

faqs.question: What is included in the wedding package?
faqs.answer: Our packages include venue rental, in-house catering, basic floral décor, accommodation for the couple, wedding coordinator services, and guest amenities. Entertainment, photography, elaborate décor, and additional services are quoted separately based on your vision.

packages.name: Royal Celebration Package
packages.description: Complete 3-night wedding experience with venue, catering, and accommodations
includes: All meals for up to 300 guests

packages.name: Maharaja Grand Package
packages.description: Premium 4-night celebration with full buyout and enhanced services
includes: All meals for up to 500 guests

packages.name: Intimate Elegance
includes: All meals for up to 100 guests

name: Taj Lake Palace
metaTitle: Taj Lake Palace Wedding | Floating Palace Wedding Venue Udaipur
metaDescription: Host your fairytale wedding at Taj Lake Palace, the iconic floating palace on Lake Pichola. Exclusive island venue, royal heritage, and Taj hospitality for unforgettable celebrations.
tagline: A Floating Dream on Lake Pichola
shortDescription: The world's most romantic hotel, Taj Lake Palace appears to float on the waters of Lake Pichola, offering an exclusive island venue for fairytale weddings.
fullDescription: Rising like a white marble dream from the waters of Lake Pichola, Taj Lake Palace is arguably the world's most romantic wedding venue. Built in 1746 by Maharana Jagat Singh II as a summer pleasure palace, this architectural wonder now offers couples the rarest of wedding experiences - an entire palace on a private island. Accessible only by boat, the palace creates an immediate sense of exclusivity and otherworldliness. With just 65 rooms and 18 suites, weddings here are inherently intimate, even when celebrating with 200 guests. The white marble courtyards, lily ponds, and centuries-old trees provide endless photo opportunities, while the panoramic views of City Palace, Aravalli Hills, and Jag Mandir create a backdrop that has graced countless magazine covers and film sets, including the James Bond classic 'Octopussy'.
uniqueSellingPoints: Only floating palace hotel in the world - complete island exclusivity
Boat-only access creates unmatched privacy and romance
James Bond movie location adding global glamour
awardsRecognitions: World's Most Romantic Hotel - Multiple Publications
Condé Nast Traveller Readers' Choice Awards
TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Hall of Fame
celebrityWeddings: High-profile destination weddings featured in Vogue

totalWeddingBudget.note: Island venue commands premium. Includes boat transfers, venue, catering, and rooms. Buyout strongly recommended.

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Drive to Udaipur city (25 km). Head to City Palace Jetty on the eastern bank of Lake Pichola. Private boat transfers to the palace are arranged from here (10-minute scenic ride).
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: Reach City Palace area. The Taj jetty is adjacent to the City Palace entrance. Boat departures every 30 minutes or on-demand for wedding guests.

parkingCapacity: Valet parking at City Palace Jetty for 100+ vehicles

weddingSeasons.weather: Peak season: 15-28°C with clear skies. Lake at highest level October-February.

alcoholPolicy: Full bar service with international spirits. Premium brands available.
noiseRestrictions: Outdoor music until 10 PM. Indoor venues until 11:30 PM. Lake sound travels - levels monitored.
cancellationPolicy: Full refund 120+ days before. 50% refund 60-119 days. No refund within 60 days.
paymentTerms: 50% booking deposit. Balance due 45 days before event.

faqs.question: How do guests reach the palace?
faqs.answer: All guests travel by decorated Taj boats from the City Palace jetty. The 10-minute boat ride itself becomes a memorable part of the wedding experience. We coordinate multiple boats for efficient guest transfers and can arrange VIP speedboat service for bridal parties.

faqs.question: What is the maximum guest capacity?
faqs.answer: Due to the island's intimate nature, we accommodate maximum 250 guests for seated events. For larger weddings, we recommend combining with Jag Mandir or mainland venues for specific functions.

faqs.question: Is the palace suitable for monsoon weddings?
faqs.answer: The palace offers beautiful indoor venues, though July-August can experience high water levels. Many couples choose September for post-monsoon freshness and greenery at reduced rates.

faqs.question: Can we do a sunrise or sunset ceremony over the lake?
faqs.answer: Absolutely - our signature offering! The Mewar Terrace is positioned perfectly for sunrise pheras or sunset receptions with the City Palace and Aravalli Hills glowing in golden light.

faqs.question: What makes Taj Lake Palace weddings unique?
faqs.answer: It's the only wedding you'll attend where every guest arrives by boat to a private island palace. The exclusivity, the heritage, and the literal fairy-tale setting create an experience no other venue in the world can match.

name: The Leela Palace Udaipur
metaTitle: The Leela Palace Udaipur Wedding | Lakeside Palace Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Experience world-class weddings at The Leela Palace Udaipur. Stunning Lake Pichola venue with modern luxury, traditional architecture, and exceptional service for 50-800 guests.
tagline: Where Mewar Heritage Meets Modern Magnificence
shortDescription: A modern palace resort set on the shores of Lake Pichola, The Leela combines traditional Mewari architecture with contemporary luxury for spectacular wedding celebrations.
fullDescription: The Leela Palace Udaipur rises majestically on the banks of Lake Pichola, offering a perfect blend of royal heritage and modern luxury. Built in the style of a Mewari palace with stunning attention to traditional architecture, the resort spans 28 acres and features 80 luxurious rooms and suites. The property's sprawling lawns, marble courtyards, and private lake frontage create versatile spaces for weddings ranging from intimate gatherings to grand 800-guest celebrations. Modern amenities seamlessly integrate with traditional design elements, while the dedicated events team brings decades of experience in executing flawless wedding celebrations.
uniqueSellingPoints: 28 acres of landscaped grounds with multiple event lawns
Private lake frontage with boat access

totalWeddingBudget.note: Competitive pricing with exceptional value. Includes venue, catering, rooms. Décor additional.

address: Lake Pichola, P.O. Box No. 125, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Take NH48 towards Udaipur. After 25 km, follow signs for Lake Pichola. Continue on the western lake road. The Leela entrance is on the right, well-signposted.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: From City Palace, head north along Lake Pichola. Continue past Fateh Sagar dam. The resort is 4 km north on the lake's western shore.

alcoholPolicy: Full bar service available. Premium international brands.
noiseRestrictions: Outdoor music until 10 PM, indoor until midnight
paymentTerms: 40% deposit, 40% at 60 days, balance at event

faqs.question: What makes The Leela different from other Udaipur venues?
faqs.answer: The Leela offers the best of both worlds - modern facilities and service standards within traditional palatial architecture. Our 28-acre campus provides flexibility for any wedding size, and our competitive pricing offers exceptional value.

faqs.question: Can you accommodate 500+ guests?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Lake View Garden comfortably seats 800 guests. For larger weddings, we can coordinate with nearby venues for specific functions while keeping the main celebration at The Leela.

faqs.question: What is your approach to sustainability?
faqs.answer: The Leela is committed to sustainable luxury. We offer eco-friendly décor options, locally sourced ingredients, plastic-free operations, and work with local artisans for authentic experiences.

name: Fateh Prakash Palace
metaTitle: Fateh Prakash Palace Wedding | Royal Heritage Wedding Venue Udaipur
metaDescription: Host an authentic royal wedding at Fateh Prakash Palace, part of the City Palace complex. Historic grandeur, Lake Pichola views, and genuine Mewar hospitality.
tagline: An Authentic Royal Residence on Lake Pichola
shortDescription: Part of the City Palace complex and still home to the Udaipur royal family, Fateh Prakash Palace offers the most authentic royal wedding experience in India.
fullDescription: Fateh Prakash Palace isn't just a wedding venue—it's a living piece of history. Part of the legendary City Palace complex and managed by the HRH Group of Hotels, this heritage palace remains connected to the Udaipur royal family. Wedding celebrations here carry an authenticity that purpose-built hotels cannot replicate. The palace's stunning Durbar Hall, with its crystal chandeliers, royal portraits, and ornate decor, has hosted maharajas and dignitaries for centuries. Its lakefront position offers unmatched views of Lake Pichola, Jag Mandir, and the surrounding hills. For couples seeking a wedding steeped in genuine royal heritage rather than recreated luxury, Fateh Prakash Palace is unparalleled.
uniqueSellingPoints: Part of City Palace complex - genuine royal heritage
Crystal Gallery with world's largest Osler crystal collection
Durbar Hall unchanged since the Maharana era
Direct Lake Pichola access from palace
Still connected to the Udaipur royal family
Most authentic palace wedding experience available
awardsRecognitions: Heritage Hotels of India - Grand Heritage Category
celebrityWeddings: Royal family celebrations continue to this day

totalWeddingBudget.note: Authentic heritage value at competitive pricing. Venue, catering, rooms included.

address: City Palace Complex, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Take NH48 to Udaipur city center. Follow signs to City Palace. The palace is within the City Palace complex, accessible through the main entrance.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: The palace is in the heart of the old city, part of the City Palace complex. Enter through the main City Palace gate.

parkingCapacity: Limited - 30 vehicles at palace, additional at City Palace parking
alcoholPolicy: Available with palace approval. Traditional ambiance maintained.
noiseRestrictions: 10 PM outdoor, 11 PM indoor - heritage neighborhood

faqs.question: Is this a real palace or a heritage hotel?
faqs.answer: Fateh Prakash Palace is a real, historic palace that's part of the City Palace complex, still connected to the Udaipur royal family. It's been converted into a heritage hotel while maintaining its authentic character.

faqs.question: What makes this different from newer palace hotels?
faqs.answer: Unlike purpose-built 'palace-style' hotels, Fateh Prakash Palace is genuinely historic. The Durbar Hall, Crystal Gallery, and architecture are original—you're celebrating in spaces where real royalty lived and entertained.

faqs.question: Is there enough room capacity for large weddings?
faqs.answer: With 21 rooms, we can accommodate 40-50 guests on-site. For larger weddings, we partner with nearby hotels for overflow accommodation while hosting all events at the palace.

name: Jagmandir Island Palace
metaTitle: Jagmandir Island Palace Wedding | Private Island Wedding Venue Udaipur
metaDescription: Host an exclusive island wedding at Jagmandir Palace on Lake Pichola. Private island venue, historic Mughal refuge, spectacular sunset ceremonies for up to 500 guests.
tagline: Your Private Island. Your Royal Celebration.
shortDescription: A historic island palace on Lake Pichola, Jagmandir offers complete island exclusivity for weddings, with 4 centuries of royal heritage as your backdrop.
fullDescription: Rising from the waters of Lake Pichola, Jagmandir Island Palace carries a romance unmatched by any mainland venue. Built in the 17th century, this island palace famously sheltered the young Mughal prince Shah Jahan—who later built the Taj Mahal. Today, managed by the HRH Group, Jagmandir opens its marble courtyards and gardens for exclusive wedding celebrations. Accessed only by traditional boats, the island creates instant exclusivity. The Kunwar Pada Gardens, with elephant-lined walkways and the palace as backdrop, offer a ceremony setting that feels genuinely magical. Unlike shared venues, Jagmandir weddings are truly private—the entire island becomes yours.
uniqueSellingPoints: Historic Mughal connection - Shah Jahan's refuge
Can host day events with mainland accommodation
awardsRecognitions: Most Unique Wedding Venue - Wedding Industry Awards

totalWeddingBudget.note: Venue only - no accommodation. Guests stay at partnering mainland hotels. Includes boat transfers.

address: Jagmandir Island, Lake Pichola, Udaipur, Rajasthan, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Drive to City Palace jetty (25 km). Private boat transfers to island (15 minutes).
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: Access from City Palace or Rameshwar Ghat jetties. Boats provided for all guests.

weddingSeasons.weather: Peak: Clear skies, calm lake, perfect sunsets

alcoholPolicy: Full bar service available on island
noiseRestrictions: Music until 10:30 PM - lake sound considerations

faqs.question: Where do guests stay if there's no accommodation?
faqs.answer: Guests stay at mainland hotels - we partner with Fateh Prakash Palace, Shiv Niwas Palace, and other lake-view hotels. Boat transfers bring everyone to the island for celebrations, creating a spectacular arrival experience.

faqs.question: Can we host multiple days of events here?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Many couples host mehendi and sangeet at mainland hotels, then use Jagmandir for the main wedding ceremony and reception. The island can host events on consecutive days.

faqs.question: What if weather is bad?
faqs.answer: Gul Mahal provides indoor backup for up to 180 guests. We also have weather monitoring and can adjust timings. In extreme weather, boats may be affected - contingency planning is part of our service.

packages.name: Island Exclusive
packages.description: Full island rental for wedding day

packages.name: Two-Day Island Celebration
packages.description: Extended island access with premium services

name: Trident Udaipur
metaTitle: Trident Udaipur Wedding | Lakeside Resort Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Plan your dream wedding at Trident Udaipur on Lake Pichola. Contemporary luxury, stunning lake views, and excellent value for celebrations of 100-600 guests.
shortDescription: A stylish Oberoi Group property offering contemporary luxury and stunning lake views at accessible price points, perfect for couples seeking quality without excess.
fullDescription: Trident Udaipur offers the refined service standards of the Oberoi Group with a more contemporary aesthetic and accessible pricing. Set on 43 acres along Lake Pichola, the resort features landscaped gardens, reflection pools, and modern architecture that complements Udaipur's heritage backdrop. With 143 rooms and versatile event spaces, Trident accommodates weddings from intimate gatherings to grand celebrations. The property's skilled events team brings the same attention to detail expected from the Oberoi Group, making it an excellent choice for couples who want exceptional quality without the premium of its sister property, Udaivilas.
uniqueSellingPoints: Oberoi Group standards at accessible pricing

totalWeddingBudget.note: Excellent value with Oberoi Group quality. Venue, catering, rooms included.

address: Haridas Ji Ki Magri, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: NH48 towards Udaipur. Follow signs to Lake Pichola western shore. Trident is well-signposted.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: Western lake road past Fateh Sagar. 5 km from City Palace.

faqs.question: How does Trident compare to Oberoi Udaivilas?
faqs.answer: Trident offers the same Oberoi Group service standards with more contemporary design and significantly lower pricing. It's ideal for couples who want quality without ultra-luxury pricing.

faqs.question: Is this suitable for large weddings?
faqs.answer: With 143 rooms and capacity for 600 seated guests, Trident is excellent for larger celebrations. The high room count means most guests can stay on-property.

name: Radisson Blu Udaipur Palace Resort & Spa
metaTitle: Radisson Blu Udaipur Wedding | Fateh Sagar Lake Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Plan your wedding at Radisson Blu Udaipur on Fateh Sagar Lake. Stunning hilltop location, panoramic views, and international hospitality for 100-800 guests.
shortDescription: Set on a hilltop overlooking Fateh Sagar Lake, Radisson Blu offers panoramic views, modern facilities, and international service standards for memorable weddings.
fullDescription: Perched on a hilltop with commanding views of Fateh Sagar Lake and the Aravalli Hills, Radisson Blu Udaipur offers a different perspective on Udaipur weddings. The resort combines international hospitality standards with local Rajasthani influences, creating a comfortable environment for guests while providing stunning venues for celebrations. With 240 rooms and extensive event spaces, the property easily accommodates large weddings while maintaining intimacy for smaller gatherings. The hilltop location ensures privacy and delivers spectacular sunset views that rival any lakeside venue.
uniqueSellingPoints: Hilltop location with panoramic lake and mountain views

totalWeddingBudget.note: Excellent value for large weddings. High room capacity keeps per-head costs low.

address: Near Fateh Sagar Lake, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Take NH48 towards Udaipur. Follow signs to Fateh Sagar Lake. The resort is on the hill above the lake, well-signposted.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: 8 km from City Palace. Take the Fateh Sagar road north. Resort entrance is on the hilltop.

faqs.question: What's the advantage of the hilltop location?
faqs.answer: The hilltop offers panoramic views of Fateh Sagar Lake and Aravalli Hills, privacy from the city bustle, and spectacular sunsets. The elevated position creates natural drama for photographs.

faqs.question: How large a wedding can you accommodate?
faqs.answer: With 240 rooms and lawns for 800+ guests, we're ideal for large celebrations. Most wedding parties can stay entirely on-property, simplifying logistics.

name: Shiv Niwas Palace
metaTitle: Shiv Niwas Palace Wedding | City Palace Complex Wedding Venue
metaDescription: Host an intimate royal wedding at Shiv Niwas Palace within Udaipur's City Palace complex. Authentic heritage, stunning lake views, perfect for 50-200 guests.
tagline: Intimate Royal Grandeur Within City Palace
shortDescription: A former royal guesthouse within the City Palace complex, Shiv Niwas offers intimate wedding celebrations with genuine heritage and stunning Lake Pichola views.
fullDescription: Shiv Niwas Palace, once the guesthouse of the Maharana of Udaipur, offers an intimate palace wedding experience within the legendary City Palace complex. With just 36 rooms and suites, weddings here are necessarily exclusive, creating a house-party atmosphere where guests truly feel like royalty. The palace's terraces offer unobstructed views of Lake Pichola and Jag Mandir, while the interiors showcase genuine royal artifacts and period furnishings. For couples seeking authentic heritage without mega-venue scale, Shiv Niwas provides the perfect intimate setting.
uniqueSellingPoints: Within City Palace complex - ultimate heritage location
Former royal guesthouse with genuine artifacts
Lake Pichola views from multiple terraces
Combined bookings possible with Fateh Prakash Palace
awardsRecognitions: Boutique Heritage Hotel of the Year

totalWeddingBudget.note: Intimate luxury within City Palace. Perfect for smaller, exclusive celebrations.

guestAmenities: Pool access (shared with City Palace hotels)
address: City Palace Complex, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: As per City Palace directions. Enter through main City Palace gate.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: Within City Palace complex, adjacent to Fateh Prakash Palace.

faqs.question: What's the relationship with Fateh Prakash Palace?
faqs.answer: Both are HRH Group properties within City Palace. Many weddings combine both venues - events at Fateh Prakash with intimate gatherings at Shiv Niwas, giving access to more rooms and venue variety.

faqs.question: Is Shiv Niwas suitable for larger weddings?
faqs.answer: With 36 rooms and capacity for 200, it's ideal for intimate weddings. For larger celebrations, combine with Fateh Prakash Palace or use Jagmandir for main ceremony.

name: Ramada Udaipur Resort & Spa
metaTitle: Ramada Udaipur Wedding | Value Luxury Wedding Venue Rajasthan
metaDescription: Plan an affordable luxury wedding at Ramada Udaipur. Excellent facilities, professional service, and competitive pricing for weddings of 100-500 guests.
shortDescription: A well-appointed resort offering international hospitality standards at competitive prices, ideal for couples seeking quality celebration without premium pricing.
fullDescription: Ramada Udaipur offers a practical yet elegant option for wedding celebrations. Part of the Wyndham hotel group, the resort delivers consistent international standards while maintaining competitive pricing. With 96 rooms and versatile event spaces, it accommodates weddings from 100 to 500 guests comfortably. The property's experienced events team understands Indian wedding requirements and works efficiently to deliver memorable celebrations. For couples prioritizing value without compromising on essential quality, Ramada represents an intelligent choice.

totalWeddingBudget.note: Excellent value proposition. Complete weddings at fraction of luxury venue costs.

drivingDirections.fromAirport: NH48 towards Udaipur. Take Kodiyat Road exit. Resort on left.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: 6 km from City Palace via Kodiyat Road.

faqs.question: Is Ramada suitable for a luxury wedding?
faqs.answer: Ramada provides excellent facilities at competitive prices. While not ultra-luxury, it offers reliable quality for couples who prefer investing in other aspects like décor, entertainment, or photography.

name: The LaLit Laxmi Vilas Palace Udaipur
metaTitle: LaLit Laxmi Vilas Palace Wedding | Heritage Palace Wedding Udaipur
metaDescription: Host your wedding at The LaLit Laxmi Vilas Palace, a restored heritage palace with stunning Fateh Sagar views. Authentic Rajputana grandeur for 100-500 guests.
shortDescription: A magnificently restored heritage palace overlooking Fateh Sagar Lake, offering authentic Rajputana grandeur with modern luxury amenities.
fullDescription: The LaLit Laxmi Vilas Palace represents the careful restoration of a genuine heritage palace into a luxury hotel while preserving its royal character. Overlooking the serene waters of Fateh Sagar Lake, the palace combines authentic period architecture with contemporary comforts. The 55 rooms and suites maintain original features while adding modern conveniences, and the event spaces showcase genuine heritage elements rarely found in purpose-built hotels. For couples who want palace wedding authenticity combined with reliable modern service, LaLit Laxmi Vilas offers an elegant solution.

totalWeddingBudget.note: Heritage palace experience at moderate pricing. Venue, catering, rooms included.

address: Fateh Sagar Lake, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

drivingDirections.fromAirport: Take NH48 to Udaipur. Follow signs to Fateh Sagar Lake. The palace is on the lake's western shore.
drivingDirections.fromCityCenter: 7 km from City Palace via Fateh Sagar road.

faqs.question: How does this compare to Lake Pichola venues?
faqs.answer: While Lake Pichola venues offer City Palace views, LaLit Laxmi Vilas provides tranquil Fateh Sagar views with genuine palace heritage. It's less crowded and offers excellent value for heritage seekers.

faqs.question: Is 55 rooms enough for larger weddings?
faqs.answer: For weddings over 100 guests, we partner with nearby hotels for overflow. All events remain at the palace with coordinated transport for off-site guests.
